title: Someone hacked my account and got my account locked
body:
I wrote a message to the support because if u get ur account locked it says "write a ticket to the support" so i've done that.

For some reason I wrote in English and I selected English as the language + I wasn't using the site in English nor the client and I got back a Hungarian message so I translated it (if you dont belive my translation go and copy&paste it in google translate)

So not only it wasn't about my problem(2nd screenshot) but my account GOT A 14 DAY BAN (when it clearly said my account got locked + when I tried to log in now it still says "locked account")

So I mentioned the "14 day ban" and they... it's just r%%%%%ed, read the picture it talks for itself
